meta.title: Stormwater & Drainage Solutions | Terratech
meta.description: Terratech specializes in sinkhole and void filling solutions using advanced 3D ground imaging and eco-friendly poly-foam technology for safe and efficient remediation without excavation.

text.subtitle: Our storm drain stabilization solutions stop soil loss and structural failure before they turn into expensive emergency repairs.

section.description: Along with on site assessment and detailed visual observation of the area, Terratech's 3D Scanning techniques and analysis can show advanced warning signs for informed remediation.

stages.label: Slab of road with a pothole and sinkhole forming
stages.title: Compaction Grouting
stages.text: This technique uses a low-mobility, thick grout injected under high pressure to displace and densify loose granular soils, increase bearing capacity, and fill voids.

stages.label: Foam applied and cured to help stabilize the unstable layer below
stages.title: Permeation Grouting
stages.text: This process injects low-viscosity grout into soil without disturbing its natural structure, filling the pores to increase bearing capacity and reduce permeability. It is suitable for granular soils like sand and gravel.

stages.label: Layer is stabilized, foam is cured, and the storm drain is insalled
stages.title: Chemical (polymer) Grouting
stages.text: This involves injecting a chemical solution, such as an expanding polymer or grout, to consolidate or lift concrete slabs and stabilize soil. Expanding polymer fills voids and compacts soil.

points.title: Early Detection
points.description: Issues are identified both below the surface and within the structure, allowing holistic repair-not just what's visible.

points.title: Precision & Safety
points.description: Repairs are performed at the most effective access point, reducing risk, cost, and damage while ensuring the problem is solved.

points.title: Minimal Disruption
points.description: Stabilization is restored with limited surface impact, helping you keep roads, properties and operations functioning during repair process.

points.title: Customized Solutions
points.description: Each solution is 100% custom and designed for your project scope.

section.description: Polymer foam is injected under standing water to create a raised, non-permeable barrier that stops erosion and further damage.
